helps to define the difference.. but you need to use "scp user@from user@to"
cheers, sorry been on my pc quite a long time now. so this will be dewy@localhost
so to copy the file on your server ~/Desktop/test.txt to your desktop computers ~/Desktop : scp you@server:/home/you/Desktop/test.txt ~/Desktop/test.txt
you change the users and hostnames depending on where you run it from (ie from server to desktop or other way round)
